name: Roger Creasy
title: Regional Digital Director for Halifax Media Group
subTitle: Sales, Marketing, Digital and Social Media strategist within the media industry.
bio: Roger's strength is finding solutions to problems through any team he lead. His programming background helps drive analytic thought-processes. Roger's wide range of experience and the creative/artistic side of his personality help him find solutions others may not.

name: Anna M Johnson
title: City Government Reporter for the Times-News
subTitle: Elon alumna, expert thumb wrestler & passionate, dedicated reporter. Interested in Eastern Africa & press rights
